pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Bayesian Vector Autoregression // Toolkit for the estimation of hierarchical Bayesian vector autoregressions. Implements hierarchical prior selection for conjugate priors in the fashion of Giannone, Lenza Primiceri (2015) doi:10.1162/REST_a_00483. Allows for the computation of impulse responses and forecasts and provides several methods for assessing results.
